Interpretation on the visual inspection of the individual MRIQC

For more information see the [documentation](https://mriqc.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html) of the MRQC

Note: The artifacts yielding exclusion are pointed using [red arrows]{style="color:red;"}, while the artifacts not yielding exclusion are pointed using [green arrows]{style="color:green;"}.
